sentences: Õnnelik, harmooniline, õnnetu, nurjunud, purunenud abielu.
Registreeritud, registreerimata, seaduslik, faktiline, fiktiivne abielu.
Tal on esimesest abielust kaks last.
context: Abielu is an Estonian noun meaning 'marriage' - the formal and often legally registered union between a man and woman to establish a family relationship. It can refer to different types of marriages such as happy, harmonious, unhappy, broken, registered, unregistered, legal, factual, fictional, religious, civil, childless marriages. The word is commonly used in discussions about marital status (e.g., 'Kas ta on abielu või vallaline?' - Is he married or single?).
